story.title: Super Finn's First Day
story.summary: Sam discovers he has superpowers on his first day at a new school and learns that the greatest power is being kind and helping others.
scenes: Finn waking up nervous about his first day at a new school
Accidentally using super strength to open his bedroom door too wide
Finn's mom helping him practice controlling his new powers
Arriving at school and trying to act normal around other kids
Finn's super hearing picking up someone crying for help
Finding a cat stuck high up in the school playground tree
Carefully using his flying power to rescue the scared cat
The other kids amazed and wanting to be Finn's friend
Finn helping a classmate who dropped all their books
Using super speed to help clean up after art class
A school bully picking on smaller children at recess
Finn standing up to the bully using words instead of powers
Teaching the bully that being kind is much better than being mean
The former bully apologizing and asking to join their games
Finn organizing a fun superhero play time for everyone
Helping the teacher carry heavy boxes without showing his strength
Finn learning that small acts of kindness are the best superpowers
Making three new best friends who accept him just as he is
Finn's mom proud of how he used his powers to help others
Finn going to bed happy, excited for tomorrow's adventures

art_style.name: Manga
art_style.coloring_style: manga style black and white line art, clean sharp lines, high contrast
art_style.cover_style: manga anime style with vibrant colors, professional cover art
art_style.complexity: detailed clean line art with expressive characters
